en.title: Ready-Made Reading Glasses
en.subTitle: AI provides a wide range of lab tests for ready-made reading glasses, including frame and lens testing to international standards.
en.soloutionTitle: Eyewear Expertise – QC for Ready-Made Readers
en.soloutionContent:
Ready-made reading glasses are usually available in strengths ranging from 1.00 to 3.50 dioptres. Even though they are readily sold in retail outlets without prescription or special consultation, ready-made readers are classified as a medical device, according to European Directive 2007/47/EC. As such, brands and retailers must pay as much attention to their quality as specialized opticians do to frames and lenses made for custom prescription eyewear.

AI provides extensive testing and inspections for ready-made reading glasses, covering all aspects of quality, safety, and compliance of the finished product and all its elements. Our eyewear laboratory is HOKLAS certified to test your products against your in-house specifications, international standards, and the regulations of your destination market.

Dedicated Eyewear Testing Labs and Inspector Resources

AI provides a two-tier process to ensure the quality and compliance of your eyewear. On-site quality control procedures conducted by our specialized inspectors address the performance characteristics of your reading glasses at every stage of production. Meanwhile, our fully accredited certified labs check a variety of optical, chemical, and mechanical properties of your eyewear, and provide you with a detailed report of the findings.

AI labs are certified to perform tests to the ISO/IEC 17025 standard for Eyewear and Ophthalmic Products, and issue testing reports with HOKLAS and ILAC endorsement. We help you ensure that your reading glasses meet the requirements of such international standards as:

  • International: ISO 16034
  • Europe: EN ISO 14139
  • USA: ANSI Z80.31
  • China: GB 10810.1, GB/T 13511
  • Australia / New Zealand: AS/NZS ISO 16034

HOKLAS Certified Lab Testing for Ready-Made Readers

The tests offered by our eyewear testing laboratory for reading glasses cover all tests required for the finished product and its components. Below is a selection of tests commonly used on frames and lenses of ready-made reading glasses. Visit the corresponding product pages to find extensive test lists.

Frames (ISO 12870): Lenses (ISO 8980, ISO 14889):
  • Frame dimensional stability: for ISO /AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139
  • Frame mechanical stability: bridge deformation, lens retention, and endurance, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139
  • Frame resistance to perspiration, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139
  • Nickel release (EN 12472 + EN16128 or ISO/TS 24348), for ISO 16034 and EN 14139
  • Resistance to ignition, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139
  • Resistance to optical radiation (frame color), for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN14139
  • Lens mechanical strength, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN14139
  • Lens surface quality, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN14139
  • Luminous transmittance, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139
  • Optical powers and tolerance, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139
  • Prismatic difference, for ISO 16034 and EN 14139
  • Resistance to ignition, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139
  • Resistance to optical radiation, for ISO / AS/NZS 16034 and EN 14139

Depending on your testing requirements, we can prepare a tailor-made testing program for your eyewear products. Get in touch with the AI team for an instant quote.

  • Fashion sunglasses
  • Ski goggles and performance eyeglasses
  • Eye and face protectors

zh.subTitle: AI亚检提供关于成品老花镜的各类实验室测试服务，包括按照国际标准对框架和镜片进行的测试。咨询详情
zh.soloutionTitle: 眼镜类产品检测专家 — 成品老花镜的质量检验
zh.soloutionContent:
现有的成品老花镜的屈光度通常为 1.00 至 3.50。成品老花镜虽然可在零售店里随意出售，并且无需处方或专项咨询，但根据欧洲指令 2007/47/EC，它依然被归类为医疗器材。因此，各品牌和零售商必须像专业眼镜商对待定制的处方眼镜类产品的框架和镜片一样，重视成品老花镜的质量。

AI 亚检提供关于成品老花镜的各种测试和检验，范围涵盖成品及其元件的质量、安全及合规性等各方面。我们的眼镜类产品实验室获得 HOKLAS 认证，可依据贵公司的规范，以及国际标准、目标市场的各类规定对您的产品进行测试。

专业的眼镜类产品测试实验室和检验团队

AI亚检通过双重检验流程确保您的眼镜类产品不但质量出众，并能符合合规性要求。供应商审核的现场质量检验流程由我们的专业检验员执行，旨在确保您的老花镜产品在每个生产阶段的性能特性；我们经权威认证的实验室测试流程对您的眼镜类产品进行各种光学、化学和力学属性检验，并为您提供一份包括了检验结果的详细报告。

AI亚检实验室测试具备按照 ISO/IEC 17025 眼镜类产品与眼科产品标准执行测试的资格，并且可签发带 HOKLAS 和国际实验室认证联盟 (ILAC) 认可的测试报告。我们将助您确保您的老花镜满足如下国际标准的要求：

  • 国际: ISO 16034
  • 欧洲: EN ISO 14139
  • 美国: ANSI Z80.31
  • 中国: GB 10810.1、GB/T 13511
  • 澳大利亚/新西兰: AS/NZS ISO 16034

HOKLAS 认证的成品老花镜实验室测试

我们的眼镜类产品测试实验室可提供各类老花镜测试，范围涵盖成品及组件的所有必要测试。成品老花镜框架和镜片的一些常见测试列举如下。请访问相应的产品页面，查找全面的测试列表。

框架 (ISO 12870)： 镜片 (ISO 8980, ISO 14889):
  • 框架尺寸稳定性，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 框架机械稳定性：中梁变形、镜片保持力和耐用性，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 框架耐汗性，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 镍释出量（EN 12472 + EN16128 或 ISO/TS 24348），标准：ISO 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 抗燃烧，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 抗光辐射（框架颜色），标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN14139
  • 镜片机械强度，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN14139
  • 镜片表面质量，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN14139
  • 光透射率，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 光学度数及公差，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 棱镜差，标准：ISO 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 抗燃性，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139
  • 抗光辐射，标准：ISO/AS/NZS 16034 和 EN 14139

我们可以根据您的测试要求，为您的眼镜类产品准备定制测试项目。请联系 AI亚检团队，获取检验解决方案以及即时报价。
